prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent:
---

The book proposes a paradigm shift in software development, suggesting that the future of programming lies in using plain human languages like English, French, or Latin.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Software development, paradigm shift, programming, plain human languages, English, French, Latin
